name: International Lead Association
goal: The International Lead Association (ILA) is a membership body that supports companies involved in the mining, smelting, refining and recycling of lead. The ILA represents the producers of about 3 three million tonnes of lead. ILA’s work has a broad focus, covering all aspects of the industry’s safe production, use and recycling of lead.
